version.text: Twitter is shutting down their streaming services. I have removed Talon Pull from the app, as it will no longer work.

Twitter has a new policy that all apps using their service should stop allowing for tweeting, liking, and retweeting using multiple accounts at once: https://blog.twitter.com/developer/en_us/topics/tips/2018/automation-and-the-use-of-multiple-accounts.html. I have unfortunately had to remove this functionality from Talon.
